amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to transfer funds from the EPA Science and Technology account to the inspector general to combat waste, fraud, and abuse.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
